chapter_title: HOW TO MEASURE SUCCESS WITH BOUNDARIES
summary: This chapter emphasizes the importance of establishing boundaries to cultivate a godly identity and achieve true success in life. It acknowledges the resistance faced when pursuing boundaries, highlighting that such struggles are a clear sign of progress. Drawing on scripture, the authors encourage perseverance through trials, as they foster growth and maturity. Achieving success through boundaries is not easy but ultimately rewarding. Readers are reminded that this journey is shared among many who have tread the path of faith, facing challenges along the way.

slides.section_body: Success is measured not by the absence of resistance, but by our ability to establish and maintain boundaries. Boundaries are essential for a godly identity and a fulfilling life. Without them, we risk losing ourselves to the pressures of the world.
slides.quote: ‘Narrow is the road that leads to life’ — Matt. 7:14.

slides.section_title: Resistance is an Indicator of Progress
slides.section_body: Encountering resistance when setting boundaries is a sign that you are on the right track. Each trial faced strengthens your resolve and deepens your faith. This is the true essence of growth and change.
slides.quote: Running into resistance is a good sign that you are doing what you need to do.

slides.section_body: Perseverance is crucial in the face of trials as it brings maturity and completeness. Embracing difficulties with a positive outlook allows us to grow in faith and resilience. Remember, the path to success is not always easy.
slides.quote: ‘Consider it pure joy... whenever you face trials’ — James 1:2.

slides.section_title: The Role of Faith in Challenges
slides.section_body: Faith acts as a guiding light through the tumultuous journey of establishing boundaries. Trusting in God's promises strengthens our resolve to keep moving forward, despite setbacks. Our faith will carry us through challenges.
slides.quote: ‘Receiving the goal of your faith, the salvation of your souls’ — 1 Peter 1:9.

slides.section_body: You are not alone in facing challenges when seeking to establish boundaries. Many have walked this path, encountering trials and triumphs alike. Embrace the stories of those who have gone before you.
slides.quote: This journey is always riddled with trouble, but also with promises.

slides.section_body: Boundaries help protect us from external pressures and unhealthy influences. They empower us to define our values and priorities. Establishing boundaries requires bravery, but it's vital for mental and spiritual health.
slides.quote: To do it right will be difficult — but it will be worth it.

slides.section_body: See resistance through a biblical lens. Each obstacle is part of a larger narrative of faith, testing our endurance. This perspective fosters hope and encourages perseverance.
slides.quote: They are part of a long history of your sisters and brothers.

slides.section_body: Having the courage to set boundaries is foundational to realizing our true selves. It’s a continuous battle, but the victory lies in reclaiming our identity and purpose. Be bold in your journey!
slides.quote: It takes a lot of courage and a lot of work.

slides.section_body: Success through boundaries leads to inner peace and fulfillment. The struggles faced will eventually culminate in growth and profound understanding. Celebrate the journey, for it shapes your character.
slides.quote: Persevering to the end will bring great reward.

slides.section_body: Every step taken toward establishing boundaries is a step towards a more authentic life. Cherish both the challenges and triumphs, as they collectively shape who you are. Embrace your journey with open arms!
slides.quote: Go for it — and remember, it will be worth it.
